GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: Serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: Serves an array of all articles
queries: sort_by (any valid column, defaults to the created_at date)
order (asc or desc, defaults to descending)

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves an individual article by its id

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments on an article by its id

comments.author: weegembump

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comments on an article by its id

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Submits votes to an article by its id
